title: Under the Strictly Glitterball with Michelle Visage: 'I’m throwing my whole self into this - I’m just sleeping and dancing'
text:
The Drag Race judge on doing it for the over-50s, freezing herself in a cold chamber and getting her spook on for Hallowe'en

One of my favourite things about being a part of Strictly is having women "of a certain age" come up to me in the street and saying thank you for representing our age group. I don't want to keep banging on and on about my age because I went into this fully aware of how old I am and also fully aware that there have been older people than me on Strictly before. I just keep reminding myself that if they can do it, then so can I. I’m throwing my whole self into this - I’m just sleeping and dancing, sleeping and dancing.

To help with any ailments, I’ve done a bit of cryotherapy...
description: The Drag Race judge on doing it for the over-50s, freezing herself in a cold chamber and getting her spook on for Hallowe'en
